quote: Having lots of money while not having inner peace is like dying of thirst while bathing in the ocean. – Paramahansa Yogananda
fact: Lizards can self-amputate their tails for protection. It grows back after a few months.
joke: Did you hear about the cheese factory that exploded in France? There was nothing left but de Brie.
